name: Final Dawn - Survivor
description:
Facing the thousands of monsters, who will become the last survivor before the final dawn?
Start the survival journey as a blade, a knight, an archer or a super wizard. Collect weapons and relics generated randomly in the battlefield. Get stronger in each kill and manage to survive each crisis. These are the keys to the final dawn!

Game Features
Full of feelings
Pixel art style is retro.
Exciting
Fight against thousands of monsters at once.
Quite easy
Clear the map with only one hand.
Fun to play
A perfect fusion of roguelike and shooting gameplay.
Collection
Come to fill in the illustrations of weapon and hero.

Come to download Final Dawn for free, and start the survivor .io!
Contact us: https://discord.gg/H9uK3vpW4A
